instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-3787: What is 820-3787? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
threads.message:
Have a <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> that has distorted looking apple logo when loading and once loaded login screen only shows couple seconds as seen in pictures but the going to just backlight only shortly after.

works fine on external. Test known good lcd was used and still same issue.

what to check first?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
<LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
threads.message: Just curious does it look like it?s been previously repaired? I had one just like that where the CPU died from doingthe FDMF fix...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
threads.message: I doubt to be dead CPU, if gets good external video...

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
threads.message: If it's the one I had, I would bet on it. If not, then yeah could be something else I suppose.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
threads.message:
Reflowing <CHIP>U9650</CHIP> didn't make a difference.

Yes, unfortunately  this board looks like its been worked on before.

Serial number C0242220072FP541M

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-3787</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> distorted image
threads.message: Yep that?s junk that?s the one I had in for ?graphics shutdowns?. Has a bad CPU already have replaced all the FDMF6708s made no difference. Time to tell the store that sent it not to send you junk
